#include<stdio.h>
 
int main()
{int t,n,i;
long long int a[101];
  long long int m=5;
   scanf("%d",&t) ;
  a[0]=1;
  a[1]=1;
  a[2]=3;
   while(t--)
   {long long int m=5;
    scanf("%d",&n);         
       
     
    
           for(i=3;i<=100;i++,m+=2)
          {a[i]=(a[i-1]*m)%1000000007;
          }
       
       
       
     
      printf("%lld\n",a[n]) ;
      
    }
 }
